definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: They planted a stake in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他們在地上栽了一根木樁。

sentences.english: This peg must prevent the winch from unwinding .
sentences.chinese: 這木樁一定是用來防止絞盤松開的。

sentences.english: The two heretics were burned at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 兩名異教徒被捆在木樁上燒死了。

sentences.english: The Maine woodsman sits on a stump whose rings number centuries of growth.
sentences.chinese: 緬茵州的伐木人坐在一段有數百年年輪的木樁上。

sentences.english: The surveyor pegged out that plot of land.
sentences.chinese: 測量員用木樁標出那塊土地的界限。

sentences.english: Contemporary Palisades home retains its surrounding natural aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 現代的木樁房保留了其周圍環境的自然美。

sentences.english: The boy tethered the goat to a stake.
sentences.chinese: 男孩把山羊拴在木樁上。

sentences.english: One hundred and twenty burned at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 一百二十人綁在木樁上被燒死。

sentences.english: The travelers are trying to peg down their tents in the storm.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊者在暴風雨中設法用木樁固定他們的帳篷。

sentences.english: Father drove the stake into the ground to build a fence.
sentences.chinese: 父親將木樁釘入地裏來造籬笆。

sentences.english: Always plant stakes to skewer your own cavalry on.
sentences.chinese: 放置木樁，然後就可以串烤你的騎兵了。

sentences.english: The city engineer staked the new school site.
sentences.chinese: 城市設計工程師用木樁標出了新學校校址。

sentences.english: They staked the goat in the back yard.
sentences.chinese: 他們把山羊拴在後院的木樁上。

sentences.english: I have staked the apple trees in my garden.
sentences.chinese: 他用木樁子撐住新栽的樹。

sentences.english: She was as stiff as a post, and never moved or stirred .
sentences.chinese: 她象一根木樁一樣直挺挺地坐着，一動不動。

sentences.english: the round pegs in the square holes.
sentences.chinese: 就像錯置於方孔裏的圓木樁。

definition: the beam of a steelyard/a balance arm
